author: ajack
msg: See if ant will allow us to set DSTAMP, and use it's property
immutability to ensure <dstamp/> doesn't over-write it.
This is to allwo antworks to generate -gump-@@DATE@@ not
-gump-$DSTAMP -- which might be in a different timezone.
